name: Bark Park! (itch)
description:
You are a dog. You're at the park. Hopefully forever.

The man said it's time to leave the park. Yay! I love the park!
Stay at the park as long as you can.

Play with toys and eat treats to earn points.
But don't let the toys and animals distract you, or you might just get caught and taken back home!

The dog souls of LD50 games.

Made for Ludum Dare 50 "Delay the Inevitable"

------------------------------------------------------

Keyboard:
Movement - WASD or Arrows
Interact - E
Sprint   - Shift
Dodge    - Space

Controller:
Movement - Left Stick
Interact - A
Sprint   - B
Dodge    - L1 or R1
